channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: AI Layoffs And The Human Cost: Can Compassionate Innovation Prevent A Cold Tech Future?
item.description: Organizations would do well to adopt approaches that seek to balance technological competitiveness with humanitarian concern.

item.title: George R.R. Martin Is Not Happy With ‘Winds Of Winter’ Fans, Not Happy At All
item.description: The 'Game Of Thrones' author vented about his readers in a weirdly hostile new blog post.

item.title: Nothing Phone (3) Release Date: iPhone Challenger Confirms New Flagship Coming Soon
item.description: The next big release from Nothing is confirmed as the Nothing Phone (3) and is just weeks away. A new tease hints at a different design.

item.title: Photoshop Mobile Coming To Android Today — For Free With All Features
item.description: The smartphone Photoshop app arrived on the iPhone in Feburary, and from today, it lands on Android phones, too.

item.title: What Video Games Can Teach Us About Global Connectivity
item.description: AI-powered tech is improving internet access in emerging markets, optimizing video game performance and helping bridge the global digital divide the w...

item.title: Which inbox?
item.description: It’s easier than ever to fall into an inbox mindset. There are things to do, and we do them. Inbox zero is the unattainable goal that fills our days. ...

item.title: What do we do when it breaks?
item.description: The unexpected happens. Systems fail, humans are unpredictable, interfaces aren’t perfect… The customer service professional demonstrates their strate...

item.title: Scripts and casting
item.description: In the theatre, the play is written before casting begins. This gives the playwright freedom and responsibility, and it puts the text first. Writing f...

item.title: Projects left undone
item.description: What’s the attainable, practical and generous thing you haven’t done yet? What will it take for it to become a priority?

item.title: Paying attention to attention
